teacher_faq_list.question: What is the time commitment?
teacher_faq_list.answer: The minimum time commitment is about 3 hours per week. If you choose to take on multiple classes, the time commitment is increased.

teacher_faq_list.question: When would I be volunteering?
teacher_faq_list.answer: The times are flexible but classes are held on either a Monday/Thursday or Tuesday/Friday schedule. They are two times per week, with each class being an hour long.

teacher_faq_list.question: Do you have any curriculum?
teacher_faq_list.answer: Yes! We have a fully formed, ready to use, curriculum.

teacher_faq_list.question: When would I start?
teacher_faq_list.answer: Start times vary but you would probably be starting in March, depending on teacher availability.

teacher_faq_list.question: How will the community service hours be documented? Will I receive official records of service hours from this?
teacher_faq_list.answer: If you are accepted as a teacher, Robotics for All is a 501(c)(3) organization and we will be glad to provide documentation or signatures needed to verify hours!

teacher_faq_list.question: Are there training programs available to the teachers?
teacher_faq_list.answer: If you are accepted as a teacher we will give you some basic training, although it’s primary purpose is to explain our software and policies. We can offer additional support as needed.

publicity_faq_list.question: What is the time commitment?
publicity_faq_list.answer: The minimum time commitment is about 3 hours per week. If you choose to take on multiple classes, the time commitment is increased.

publicity_faq_list.question: When would I start?
publicity_faq_list.answer: The next orientation will be in 1-2 weeks. If accepted, Ben will contact you with details about the orientation. You can start once you go through the orientation!

publicity_faq_list.question: How will the community service hours be documented? Will I receive official records of service hours from this?
publicity_faq_list.answer: If you are accepted as a teacher we will give you some basic training, although it’s primary purpose is to explain our software and policies. We can offer additional support as needed.
